message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
Let's split this down the middle. It's fair and we both get a good amount.
I'll give you a bit less, but still a good deal
I'm willing to give you a slightly bigger share this time, but I'm hoping we can reach a more even split soon. Let's work together to find a solution that's fair to both of us.
Come on, meet me in the middle of our last offers
This is my final offer before we both get nothing. I'm willing to give you a slight advantage, but it's the closest I'm willing to go to your previous offers.  Think about it carefully.
